remarks: An associative property between group multiple and ring multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
statement:
mulgass3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mulgass3.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` R ) $.
mulgass3.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) $.
mulgass3 $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( N e. ZZ /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X .X. ( N .x. Y ) ) = ( N .x. ( X .X. Y ) ) ) $.
